Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/arbReal

Synopsis Generate a random real value.
Function real arbReal( )
Description Returns an arbitrary real value in the interval [0.0, 1.0].
Examples 
rascal>import Number;
ok
rascal>arbReal();
real: 0.3446491455856151
rascal>arbReal();
real: 0.21829675375646307
rascal>arbReal();
real: 0.5294344449639725
